attributes.action: Stop cutting Disability Benefits for Disabled
attributes.additional_details:
People with disabilities find it difficult enough to live with daily life challenges not to mention any pain they may be suffering with on a day-to-day basis.

It is extremely unfair that the government are targeting the disabled because of cut backs when it is clear the disabled person has limited options to the abled person.

Disability benefits are low and it most times they don’t even cover the bills.

We ask the government NOT to financially target the disabled and to review these plans.
attributes.background: We are calling on the government to reconsider cutting PIP benefits in-line with inflation rates and to understand that people with disabilities are very limited in what they can do which is not by choice - Therefore, should not be financially penalised as a result as this is extremely unfair.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Stop PIP Cuts: Protect Support for Disabled People

Protect Disabled people who cannot work from planned cuts to benefits
